page.title: 04LIFE IN FREELAND
page.content:
{ W interviewed a boy called Nichol who is 11 years old. He has lived in Freeland all his life and likes living there. In his family there are three males, his brother, his dad and himself. There is one female, his mum. His dad is a solicitor and his mum does not have a paid job. His pets are a budgie, a dog and a rabbit. Sometimes he goes shopping in Oxford on Saturday.
His hobbies are boxing, cricket and football. The best place to play is the playing behind his house.
Nichol goes to school on a bike or by car. He has had 4 teachers at the primary school and there are 5 teachers at the school. His favourite subjects are story and maths.
